title: AddExceptionBACnetDateRange (Method)
text:
METHOD AddExceptionBACnetDateRange : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Adds a date range to the Exception_Schedule-Property of this BACnet-Object.

rows.Name: bacStartDat
rows.Comment: The start of the exception date range.

rows: The end of the exception date range.

The times and values during the date range which correspond
to the exception date.
The number of times and values for the exceptions.
The priority with which the values are written.
